Settings updated successfully: MP, Rage continuously displayed after battle opens

Settings updated successfully: HP continuously displayed after battle opens

Settings updated successfully: One-click sell in order from low to high grade

Settings updated successfully: Open auto-save (only saves when switching scenes and after battles)

Settings updated successfully: Save every 10 minutes in free state (requires auto-save to be enabled)
